alert.note: Alert for Coastal Martin; Inland Martin; Inland St. Lucie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 1:44PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern St. Lucie and Martin Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 144 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles west of North County Airport, or 12 miles southeast of Indiantown, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stuart, Indiantown, Tequesta, Jupiter Island and Palm City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Martin; Inland Martin; Inland St. Lucie
